result.execSummary:
The defendant Ronald G King was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: pay in full by 9/1/2015, failure to pay will result in 1 day jail for each $25 remaining outstanding.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Ronald G King
Current: N85 W17170 Lee Place, Menomonee Falls, WI 53051 United States  (Effective: 10-09-2015)
Prior: N85 W97170 Lee Pl, Menomonee Falls, WI 53051

ADDRESS INFO for Ronald G King  PROVIDED BY DEFENDANT VIA PURPLE FORM
Current: N85 W97170 Lee Pl, Menomonee Falls, WI 53051   (Effective: 01-07-2015)
Prior: N85 W17170 Lee Pl, Menomonee Falls, WI 53051

Defendant Ronald G King in court.  Jeffrey Alan Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived right to an attorney. Def given pretrial offer, will review and case will be recalled. Case recalled. Appearances same. Plea of no contest.   Court accepts plea, finds the defendant guilty and renders sentence.

State by DA Adam Gerol.   Defendant in custody & appearing by video conferencing from the Ozaukee County Jail and with Atty Alme Boaz on a warrant return.  Counsel waives reading of the complaint.  Counsel further advises the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation.  Counsel advises the defendant turned self in on warrant.  State recommends a signature bond.  Court examines defendant on right to counsel and advises will be retaining private counsel.  Court orders $250 signature bond w/condition:  not to operate m/v w/out valid dl.  Court orders matter adj to 3/5 at 1:15 pm for plea hearing.
Per Dispatch, subject is in custody on warrant

Defendant Ronald G King not in court. Jeffrey A. Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds probable cause.  Upon defendant's failure to appear, court orders warrant to issue. Forfeit any bail.
Initial appearance on February 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
